description: Ayase puts pressure on Kirino and eventually discovers her hobby, telling her they can`t be friends any longer. Noticing Kirino falling into despair, Kyousuke tries talking to Ayase who cannot accept her friend`s hobby having seen reports of crimes relating to adult game. When all else fails, Kyousuke decides to take drastic measures.

titles.title: La meilleure amie de ma petite sœur n`est pas aussi coincée que ça ?
Ore no Imouto no Shin`yuu ga Konna ni XX na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister`s Friend Can Be This XX
俺の妹の親友がこんなに××なわけがない
